resources.string: The program is designed to study improving simple visual-motor response, which lies at the heart of the human psychomotor sphere.
The program settings allow you to implement many tasks and create an individual program for the diagnosis and development of the reaction.
The program can become a diary of your condition, an indicator readiness for work, simple reaction simulator.
We wish you success in studying your psychomotor skills!
Press [START] and wait for the signal to appear.
Pressing before the signal or after it disappears - error (if the option is not installed). In the presetting mode, you must first click on the working field, and when a signal appears, release it.
The job runs up to the specified number of SUCCESSFUL attempts.
In test mode, results will be accumulated to monitor your progress.
Setting the size, background color and signal allows customize the screen for comfortable operation of the program on any device.
The release mode studies a simple response under pre-tuning conditions, and the ability to skip the signal is useful for athletes of different roles.
By changing the number of attempts, the stability of the reaction is studied with increasing fatigue, and hiding the result, you can assess the accuracy of self-assessment of your actions.
Try each setting at work and find a comfortable environment for regular work.
